021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Dialect;
022import org.intellij.lang.annotations.Language;
023
024/**
025 * TNEDialect
026 *
027 * @author creatorfromhell
028 * @since 0.1.2.0
029 */
030public interface TNEDialect extends Dialect {
031
032  @Language("SQL")
033  String accountsTable();
034
035  @Language("SQL")
036  String accountsNonPlayerTable();
037
038  @Language("SQL")
039  String accountsPlayerTable();
040
041  @Language("SQL")
042  String accountMembersTable();
043
044  @Language("SQL")
045  String holdingsTable();
046
047  @Language("SQL")
048  String receiptsTable();
049
050  @Language("SQL")
051  String receiptsHoldingsTable();
052
053  @Language("SQL")
054  String receiptsParticipantsTable();
055
056  @Language("SQL")
057  String receiptsModifiersTable();
058
059  @Language("SQL")
060  String accountPurge(final int days);
061
062  @Language("SQL")
063  String receiptPurge(final int days);
064
065  //player name save
066  @Language("SQL")
067  String saveName();
068
069  //load accounts
070  @Language("SQL")
071  String loadAccounts();
072
073  //account load
074  @Language("SQL")
075  String loadAccount();
076
077  //account save
078  @Language("SQL")
079  String saveAccount();
080
081  //non player load
082  @Language("SQL")
083  String loadNonPlayer();
084
085  //non player save
086  @Language("SQL")
087  String saveNonPlayer();
088
089  //player load
090  @Language("SQL")
091  String loadPlayer();
092
093  //player save
094  @Language("SQL")
095  String savePlayer();
096
097  //members load
098  @Language("SQL")
099  String loadMembers();
100
101  //members save
102  @Language("SQL")
103  String saveMembers();
104
105  //holdings load
106  @Language("SQL")
107  String loadHoldings();
108
109  //holdings save
110  @Language("SQL")
111  String saveHoldings();
112
113  //receipts load
114  @Language("SQL")
115  String loadReceipts();
116
117  //receipt save
118  @Language("SQL")
119  String saveReceipt();
120
121  //receipts load
122  @Language("SQL")
123  String loadReceiptHolding();
124
125  //receipt holding save
126  @Language("SQL")
127  String saveReceiptHolding();
128
129  //receipt participants load
130  @Language("SQL")
131  String loadParticipants();
132
133  //receipt participant save
134  @Language("SQL")
135  String saveParticipant();
136
137  //receipt modifiers load
138  @Language("SQL")
139  String loadModifiers();
140
141  //receipt modifier save
142  @Language("SQL")
143  String saveModifier();
144}
